name: I'm Rooting for You
description:
You just got a new plant and you're curious to find out what it will turn into, but first you need to take care of it.

What does a plant need again?

GameBoy Controls on Keyboard:

  • A -> X
  • B -> C
  • Start -> Enter
  • Select -> Space

This game was made for the GBJAM 10 and contains 4 different endings. Find them all by trying different ways to take care of the plant.

If you want to know how to achieve each ending follow the steps below for the respective ending:

Dead Plant Ending (1/4)

  • Do not feed the plant
  • Do not give water to the plant or give it more than 2 times per day
  • Do not give light to the plant or give it more than 2 times per day

Neutral Plant Ending (2/4)

  • Feed the plant at least once
  • Give it water at least 1 time per day
  • Give it light at least 1 time per day

Bad Plant Ending (3/4)

  • Feed the plant with meat at least 3 times
  • Give it water at least 1 time per day
  • Give it light at least 1 time per day
  • Be mean when talking to the plant (3rd option)

Good Plant Ending (4/4)

  • Feed the plant with premium food at least 1 time
  • DO NOT feed the plant with meat
  • Give water to the plant at least 3 times
  • Give light to the plant at least 3 times
  • Be nice when talking to the plant 2 times (1st and 2nd option)
  • If you're mean to the plant you must counter with a positive comment
